summary: The diff implements deployment-related configurations and mainnet reliability improvements (error handling, loading states, retry functionality, graceful asset fallbacks) across frontend components. However, there is no evidence of actual deployment execution (REQ-45), production canister configuration (REQ-48), or deployment verification (REQ-46, REQ-47, REQ-49). The diff focuses on making the frontend more robust for mainnet conditions but does not show the deployment process itself.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the application to Internet Computer mainnet using dfx deploy --network ic
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of deployment commands, dfx.json network configuration for mainnet, canister_ids.json, or deployment scripts. The diff only shows code changes, not deployment execution.

missing_requirements.requirement: Configure production-appropriate canister settings for mainnet deployment including cycle management, compute allocation, and memory allocation
missing_requirements.reason: No dfx.json modifications or canister configuration files showing cycle management, compute allocation, memory limits, or controller settings for production.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify the deployed frontend on mainnet can successfully connect to the deployed backend canister and load all core functionality
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment verification artifacts, test results, or evidence that the application was actually deployed to mainnet and tested. Only code changes for robustness are shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure Internet Identity authentication works correctly on the mainnet deployment
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of mainnet Internet Identity configuration updates, production canister ID references, or deployment verification that authentication works on mainnet.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify all static assets including generated brainrot-themed images are correctly deployed and accessible from the frontend canister on mainnet
missing_requirements.reason: While graceful fallbacks for asset loading were added, there is no evidence of actual mainnet deployment or verification that assets are accessible on the production network.
